summary.span: 该 类包含在 查询过程中由 Active Directory 层次结构返回的 实例。

span.span: The class contains the instances that the Active Directory hierarchy returned during a query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于实现限制, 在垃圾回收类时, 该类无法释放其所有非托管资源。Due to implementation restrictions, the class cannot release all of its unmanaged resources when it is garbage collected. 若要防止内存泄露, 必须在不再需要该对象时调用方法。To prevent a memory leak, you must call the method when the object is no longer needed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 对象使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources that are used by the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法, 它允许出于其他目的重新分配使用的资源。 The method, it allows the resources that are used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关的详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md). 垃圾回收器不会释放对象的内存。The garbage collector does not release memory for a object. 因此, 应用程序必须显式调用方法以防止内存泄漏。Therefore, an application must call the method explicitly to prevent a memory leak.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示释放托管资源和非托管资源； 表示仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 对象占用的非托管资源，还可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共方法和方法调用。This method is called by the public method and the method. 调用受保护的方法, `disposing`并将参数`true`设置为。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `false`并将参数设置为。 `disposing` invokes with the `disposing` parameter set to `false`. 当参数为`true`时, 此方法释放该引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。 `disposing`When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this references. 垃圾回收器不会释放对象的内存。The garbage collector does not release memory for a object. 因此, 你必须显式调用方法以防止内存泄漏。Therefore, you must call the method explicitly to prevent a memory leak. 此方法调用集合中每个对象的方法。This method invokes the method of each object in the collection. 有关 和的详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

para.span: 此方法可由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: The method can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当重写方法时, 请注意不要引用之前在调用方法时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding the method be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to the method.

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息, 请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Handle As IntPtr
public: property IntPtr Handle { IntPtr get(); };

summary.span: 获取由执行实际搜索的 IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch 方法返回的句柄。

span.span: Gets the handle that is returned by the IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch method that performs the actual search.

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch 一文。

span.span: For more information, see the IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch article.

value.span: 此集合使用的 ADS_SEARCH_HANDLE 值。

span.span: The ADS_SEARCH_HANDLE value that this collection uses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建此集合的将`IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch`调用方法, 这会使查询结果可用于该对象。The that created this collection calls the `IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch` method, which makes the query results available to the object. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](/windows/desktop/api/iads/nf-iads-idirectorysearch-executesearch) 一文。For more information, see the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](/windows/desktop/api/iads/nf-iads-idirectorysearch-executesearch) article. 每次执行查询时, 该查询的结果的句柄都与其对象相关联。Each time that a query is performed, a handle for the results of that query is associated with its object. 此句柄对应于 ADSI 中的搜索句柄。This handle corresponds to the search handle in ADSI. 此句柄会一直保持到对对象调用方法, 因此必须调用以防止内存泄漏。This handle persists until you call the method on the object, so you must call to prevent a memory leak. 垃圾回收器不会释放此特定对象的内存。The garbage collector does not free memory for this particular object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 C# 中，此属性是 类的索引器。In C#, this property is the indexer for the class. 在 JScript 中, 可以使用由某个类型定义的默认索引属性, 但不能显式定义自己的索引属性。In JScript, you can use the default indexed properties defined by a type, but you cannot explicitly define your own. 但是, 在类上指定 expando 特性将自动提供其类型为 Object、索引类型为的默认索引属性。However, specifying the expando attribute on a class automatically provides a default indexed property whose type is Object and with an index type of .

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 的访问。 returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the . 命名空间中的大多数集合类也实现了同步方法, 该方法提供了围绕基础集合的同步包装。Most collection classes in the namespace also implement a Synchronized method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection. 枚举集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. [Visual Basic, C#][Visual Basic, C#] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在整个枚举过程中锁定集合:The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: ```csharp ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object Implements ICollection.SyncRoot

summary.span: 获取可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于其基础存储区不公用的集合，预期的实现是返回当前实例。For collections whose underlying store is not publicly available, the expected implementation is to return the current instance. 请注意, 对于包装其他集合的集合, 指向当前实例的指针可能不足:这些应返回基础集合的`SyncRoot`属性。Note that the pointer to the current instance might not be sufficient for collections that wrap other collections; those should return the underlying collection's `SyncRoot` property. 命名空间中的大多数集合类也实现 `Synchronized` 方法，该方法对基础集合提供同步的包装。Most collection classes in the namespace also implement a `Synchronized` method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection. 不过，派生类可使用 属性来提供各自的同步版本的集合。However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the property. 同步代码必须对集合的 (而不是直接在集合上) 执行操作。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the collection, not directly on the collection. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体地说，这样可与可能同时对集合实例进行修改的其他线程保持正确的同步。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection instance. 如果集合中不存在`Synchronized`方法, 则的预期用法如下所示:In the absence of a `Synchronized` method on a collection, the expected usage for looks like this: ```csharp ICollection MyCollection =... lock(MyCollection.SyncRoot) { // Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection as New ICollection() SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot ' Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. End SyncLock ``` 枚举集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. [Visual Basic, C#][Visual Basic, C#] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在整个枚举过程中锁定集合:The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: ```csharp ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```
